Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Doug Horkey
Reviews.Content: Cuts in and out when you wiggle the plug end. Very frustrating to figgure out why your cammera is not working when you have to wiggle the wires. Made very cheap.

Reviews.Title: Work great!!!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: I put in an eight camera system and had to make up alot of my own lines due to the distance I was running and these made it very easy!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Addition
Reviews.Author: Selby P
Reviews.Content: Purchased the pig tails to assist with the installation of a central power supply for my CCTV cameras. These pig tails came in real handy and made it easy to neatly install the cables.

Reviews.Title: Wires were corroded
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I think the ad for this product is misleading.  You think you are getting 16 of both ends when it is only 8 of each.  Additionally, when I stripped the wiring back to make connections the wire looked like it had been stored under water.  The copper was corroded and it easily broke.  This is a very convenient product, but the quality is poor.

Reviews.Title: excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: WB
Reviews.Content: I ordered theses connectors thinking I could connect 16 cameras to the power distribution box withthis package. I found I could only use the male connectors and had no use for the female connectors.I emailed the supplier and they told me to return the females and they would send me 8 males, which they promptly did, and I mean PROMPTLY! Thank you. I also bought the power distribution box from them.

ProductInfo.Features:
Power pigtail allows easy connection between surveillance camera and power supply
8 Male Power Pigtails
8 Female Power Pigtails
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QSDCPG16 Power Pigtails with 16 Connectors
